name: Forage (Cryptomnesic Softworks)
description:
Your family has always lived in the shade of the Tree.

The Tree brings forth children from the bones. You desire more. 

Go forth and explore.

Collect what grows and determine how to combine plants to survive the wilderness.

Each generation teaches the next what it has learned.

Made for LD48

Learn to forage and pass the knowledge down. Combine with 1-5 keys. Eat with E and drop undesired plants with X

18 formulas

5 endings
